distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for strongswan fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2017-11185: Specific RSA signatures passed to the gmp plugin for verification can
cause a null-pointer dereference and it may lead to a denial of service (bsc#1051222)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: The gmp plugin in strongSwan before 5.6.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and daemon crash) via a crafted RSA signature.
notes.title: CVE description
